Text: Thanks so much for this torrent.  It works wonderfully and it is also the best version...this is the Studio version, which costs $899.00!  There are some features that do not work when it calls for downloading the files from the resource library because the license is not recognized by Spiralgraphics' server, but for the most part , it is wonderful!  I am creating my own textures now for my 3D grahpics scenes.  Keep up the good work.  Any way you can you get a hold of ZBrush 4R2?
